nodes.text: Rex Shaxrigge was a male holostar during the rise of the Galactic Empire. While on Etti IV, a Corporate Sector Authority official tried to arrest him for stealing industry secrets; Shaxrigge had allegedly been romancing female executives in order to do so. In response, he pulled a vibro-shiv on the officer, but was distracted by a bystander named Fiolla. Shaxrigge was arrested and the incident led to the start of Fiolla's career with the Authority.
